public ref class EntityKey sealed : IEquatable<System::Data::EntityKey ^>

summary.span: 提供对作为实体类型实例的对象的持久引用。

span.span: Provides a durable reference to an object that is an instance of an entity type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是不可变的，也就是说，这些对象在构造之后不可以修改。The objects are immutable; that is, after they are constructed they cannot be modified. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用实体键](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f4206-d277-43a1-a72f-4e86fdf12b9f)。For more information, see [Working with Entity Keys](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fe3f4206-d277-43a1-a72f-4e86fdf12b9f). ## Examples 这些示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。These examples are based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 示例演示如何创建和使用。The examples show you how to create and use an . [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#EntityKeyClass_TryGetObjectByKey](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#entitykeyclass_trygetobjectbykey)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#EntityKeyClass_TryGetObjectByKey](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#entitykeyclass_trygetobjectbykey)] [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#AddObjectUsingKey](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#addobjectusingkey)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#AddObjectUsingKey](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#addobjectusingkey)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含一些值的副本，为此类型实体指定的逻辑键就是由这些值构成的。The class contains a copy of the values that make up the logical key that is specified for this type of entity. 在 中， 的成员都具有一个属性名称和一个值，其中键是属性名称，值是对象的该属性的实际值。The members of the each have a property name and a value in a , where the key is the property name and the value is the actual value of that property on the object.

Public Shared ReadOnly EntityNotValidKey As EntityKey

summary.span: 一个简单的 ，标识由失败的 [TREAT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/treat-entity-sql.md) 运算产生的实体。

span.span: A simple identifying an entity that resulted from a failed [TREAT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/treat-entity-sql.md) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有多种方法可获得无效实体。There are various ways to get an invalid entity. 最常见情况是何时[!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)]查询使用[将视为](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/treat-entity-sql.md)运算符来解释为特定类型的多态类型的实例和相关的实例不匹配。The most common scenario is when an [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] query uses the [TREAT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/treat-entity-sql.md) operator to interpret an instance of a polymorphic type as a particular type, and the instance in question does not match. ([对待](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/treat-entity-sql.md)类似于 C#`as`运算符)。([TREAT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/treat-entity-sql.md) is similar to the C# `as` operator). 在这种情况下，查询返回无效实体，该实体的实体键设置为 。In this case, the query returns an entity that is not valid, and the entity key of the resulting entity is set to .

returns.span: 如果此实例与 具有相等的值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this instance and have equal values; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 临时键与永久键的比较语义不同：Temporary keys have different comparison semantics than permanent keys: - 临时键使用引用相等性。Temporary keys use reference equality. 也就是说，对同一个临时 实例的两个引用是相等的，但其他 实例不相等。That is, two references to the exact same temporary instance are equal but no other instances are equal. - 永久键根据所包含的键属性的值和 来确定相等性。Permanent keys determine equality based on the values of the contained key properties and the . 也就是说，对于两个独立的 实例，如果它们的实体集相同并且键值相等，则这两个实例相等。That is, you can have two separate instances that are equal if their entity sets are the same and their key values are equal. 此外，临时键没有 或键值，但永久键有。In addition, temporary keys have no or key values, but permanent keys do.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 临时键与永久键的比较语义不同：Temporary keys have different comparison semantics than permanent keys: - 临时键使用引用相等性。Temporary keys use reference equality. 也就是说，对同一个临时 实例的两个引用是相等的，但其他 实例不相等。That is, two references to the exact same temporary instance are equal but no other instances are equal. - 永久键根据所包含的键属性的值和 来确定相等性。Permanent keys determine equality based on the values of the contained key properties and the . 也就是说，对于两个独立的 实例，如果它们的 对象相同并且键值相等，则这两个实例相等。That is, you can have two separate instances that are equal if their objects are the same and their key values are equal. 此外，临时键没有 或键值，但永久键有。In addition, temporary keys have no or key values, but permanent keys do.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the is temporary.

value.span: 如果 是临时的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is temporary; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新实体时，[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]会定义临时键并将 属性设置为 `true`。When a new entity is created, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] defines temporary key and sets the property to `true`. 当您调用方法，[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]分配的永久键，并设置属性设置为`false`。When you call the method, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] assigns a permanent key and sets the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 临时键是由框架自动构造的，用户不能直接构造。Temporary keys are constructed automatically by the framework; they cannot be constructed directly by a user. 临时键与永久键的比较语义不同：Temporary keys have different comparison semantics than permanent keys: - 临时键使用引用相等性。Temporary keys use reference equality. 也就是说，对同一个临时 实例的两个引用是相等的，但其他 实例不相等。That is, two references to the exact same temporary instance are equal but no other instances are equal. - 永久键根据所包含的键属性的值和 来确定相等性。Permanent keys determine equality based on the values of the contained key properties and the . 也就是说，对于两个独立的 实例，如果它们的实体集相同并且键值相等，则这两个实例相等。That is, you can have two separate instances that are equal if their entity sets are the same and their key values are equal. 此外，临时键没有 或键值，但永久键有。In addition, temporary keys have no or key values, but permanent keys do. 如果调用实体的 的 方法，并且实体事务从 状态变为 状态，[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] 会为实体自动计算新的永久键，并同步所有临时键引用。When the method is called on an entity's and the entity transitions from the state to state, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] automatically computes a new permanent key for the entity and synchronizes all temporary key references.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Data.EntityKey NoEntitySetKey
Public Shared ReadOnly NoEntitySetKey As EntityKey

summary.span: 一个单独的 ，它标识一个只读实体。

span.span: A singleton by which a read-only entity is identified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只读实体标识的实体除了与实际实体集不关联之外，在其他各方面都是有效的。A read-only entity identifies an entity that is valid in every way, except that it is not associated with an actual entity set. 在构造和返回查询文本内指定的实体实例（相对于从数据库表中检索的实体）的查询中，它可能是 [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 查询结果的一部分。This can occur as part of the result of an [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] query that constructs and returns an entity instance specified within the text of the query (as opposed to an entity that was retrieved from a database table). 与某个实体集关联之前，没有实体集的实体不能保存到数据库中。An entity that does not have an entity set cannot be persisted to the database until it is associated with some entity set. 因此，无论指定的实际合并选项是什么，对象具体化程序都以指定了 合并选项的方式处理这种实体。Therefore, the object materializer will treat this kind of entity as if the merge option was specified, regardless of the actual merge option that was specified. 将创建一个实体对象，但不解析它的身份，也不将它作为具体化过程的一部分添加到状态管理器中。An entity object will be created, but its identity will not be resolved and it will not be added to the state manager as part of the materialization process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 临时键与永久键的比较语义不同：Temporary keys have different comparison semantics than permanent keys: - 临时键使用引用相等性。Temporary keys use reference equality. 也就是说，对同一个临时 实例的两个引用是相等的，但其他 实例不相等。That is, two references to the exact same temporary instance are equal but no other instances are equal. - 永久键根据所包含的键属性的值和 来确定相等性。Permanent keys determine equality based on the values of the contained key properties and the . 也就是说，对于两个独立的 实例，如果它们的实体集相同并且键值相等，则这两个实例相等。That is, you can have two separate instances that are equal if their entity sets are the same and their key values are equal. 此外，临时键没有 或键值，但永久键有。In addition, temporary keys have no or key values, but permanent keys do. 此运算符的等效方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is 方法 System.Data.Entity 4.0.0.0 Method System.Data.Entity 4.0.0.0 System.Boolean System.Boolean 要比较的 。A to compare. 要比较的 。A to compare. 比较两个 对象。Compares two objects. 如果 与 值不相等，则为 ；否则为 。 if the and values are not equal; otherwise, . < ！[CDATA [ ## Remarks 临时键与永久键的比较语义不同：Temporary keys have different comparison semantics than permanent keys: - 临时键使用引用相等性。Temporary keys use reference equality. 也就是说，对同一个临时 实例的两个引用是相等的，但其他 实例不相等。That is, two references to the exact same temporary instance are equal but no other instances are equal. - 永久键根据所包含的键属性的值和 来确定相等性。Permanent keys determine equality based on the values of the contained key properties and the . 也就是说，对于两个独立的 实例，如果它们的实体集相同并且键值相等，则这两个实例相等。That is, you can have two separate instances that are equal if their entity sets are the same and their key values are equal. 此外，临时键没有 或键值，但常规键有。In addition, temporary keys have no or key values, but regular keys do. 此运算符的等效方法是。The equivalent method for this operator is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 临时键与永久键的比较语义不同：Temporary keys have different comparison semantics than permanent keys: - 临时键使用引用相等性。Temporary keys use reference equality. 也就是说，对同一个临时 实例的两个引用是相等的，但其他 实例不相等。That is, two references to the exact same temporary instance are equal but no other instances are equal. - 永久键根据所包含的键属性的值和 来确定相等性。Permanent keys determine equality based on the values of the contained key properties and the . 也就是说，对于两个独立的 实例，如果它们的实体集相同并且键值相等，则这两个实例相等。That is, you can have two separate instances that are equal if their entity sets are the same and their key values are equal. 此外，临时键没有 或键值，但常规键有。In addition, temporary keys have no or key values, but regular keys do.
